properties.name: template
properties.description: The template you want to send. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: fromEmail
properties.description: Email address of the sender optional with name

properties.name: toEmail
properties.description: Email address of the recipient. Multiple ones can be separated by comma.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to enable a background sending mode that is optimized for bulk sending. In async mode, messages/send will immediately return a status of "queued" for every recipient. To handle rejections when sending in async mode, set up a webhook for the 'reject' event. Defaults to false for messages with no more than 10 recipients; messages with more than 10 recipients are always sent asynchronously, regardless of the value of async.

options.name: async
options.description: Whether to enable a background sending mode that is optimized for bulk sending. In async mode, messages/send will immediately return a status of "queued" for every recipient. To handle rejections when sending in async mode, set up a webhook for the 'reject' event. Defaults to false for messages with no more than 10 recipients; messages with more than 10 recipients are always sent asynchronously, regardless of the value of async.

options.name: autoText
options.description: Whether or not to automatically generate a text part for messages that are not given text

options.name: autoHtml
options.description: Whether or not to automatically generate an HTML part for messages that are not given HTML

options.name: bccAddress
options.description: An optional address to receive an exact copy of each recipient's email

options.name: fromName
options.description: Optional from name to be used

options.name: googleAnalyticsCampaign
options.description: Optional string indicating the value to set for the utm_campaign tracking parameter. If this isn't provided the email's from address will be used instead.

options.name: googleAnalyticsDomains
options.description: An array of strings separated by a comma (,) indicating for which any matching URLs will automatically have Google Analytics parameters appended to their query string automatically

properties.name: metadataUi
properties.description: Metadata an associative array of user metadata. Mandrill will store this metadata and make it available for retrieval. In addition, you can select up to 10 metadata fields to index and make searchable using the Mandrill search api.

properties.name: metadataJson
properties.description: Metadata an associative array of user metadata. Mandrill will store this metadata and make it available for retrieval. In addition, you can select up to 10 metadata fields to index and make searchable using the Mandrill search api.

properties.name: attachmentsJson
properties.description: An array of supported attachments to add to the message

properties.name: attachmentsUi
properties.description: The MIME type of the attachment

properties.name: headersJson
properties.description: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed)

properties.name: headersUi
properties.description: Optional extra headers to add to the message (most headers are allowed)
